title: I write with my left hand but conduct other activities with my right hand, what does this mean? - Quora

response.answer_text: In the immortal words of Ned Flanders : Diddly. It means nothing. If your left hand is your dominant hand, you’re left handed. I am left handed. I cannot write with my right hand. Not at all. I use a computer mouse with my right hand. I wipe my bum with my right hand. I play guitar, drums, and many other instruments in the right handed position. I hold my cutlery like a right handed person (with my fork in my left, which seems odd to me, because that’s my good hand, but whatever, you right handed oddballs). It means nothing. To anyone. I don’t even care which hand I use for stuff.

Me too. I write, eat and shoot, left handed but do almost everything else right handed. I am 81 and have to say it has not affected my life in any significant way so I quit worrying about it years ago. I would recommend you do the same…
